website_summaries.verdict: With 35 pieces that provide more options to make numerous faces than a typical Mr. Potato Head, this kit tops our list for the best value Playskool has to offer of the classic toy.
pros: Not only do you get Mr
Potato Head with this kit, but numerous pieces to make lots of funny faces
cons: A few complaints of pieces that were difficult to put into the designated holes
The latch on the case could be sturdier

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Mr. Potato Head!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son by recommendation by his speech therapist. She suggested using Mr. Potato Head as a way to help him learn how to socialize and carry conversations. It has many different parts and its fun to put together and make different types of personalities for Mr. Potato Head. Its a great price and has more to offer than the basic one most stores carry. Its easy to clean and Mr. Potato head can store most of the items inside of him, but the carrying case is a big bonus for keeping everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Whats the point of a suitcase that doesn't stay shut?
customer_reviews.text: I use Potato Head almost daily in my work as a speech therapist. It is very useful for targeting many receptive and expressive language goals. I was psyched for the suitcase but was dismayed to find that the suitcase does not shut at all. So all of the components end up falling out and into my toy bag. And there are too many of them to fit into a gallon zip lock bag which is what I use for most of games/toys. For now I'll just use an elastic band around the suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Volpini

customer_reviews.title: Great value and loads of fun.
customer_reviews.text: This potato head suitcase is a great value. The selection of arms, face pieces and accessories you get is enough to make some pretty silly potatoes. You also get a potato body with this set, so it's ready to start making potato people right out of the box. My kids have a fun time trying to make the ugliest potato. I've given this 4 stars because some of the pieces are incredibly hard to put in the potato all the way, and likewise very difficult to get out. I hope they'll loosen up with time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon for EVERYTHING

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves it! So many pieces! It’s a great way to help tune their fine motor skills. Not to mention, Learn the colors.
customer_reviews.author: AnaT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: In true Mr. Potato Head fashion, the items in this set are off great quality, made to withstand the ministrations of young children for years. Set contains a wide assortment of parts, some of which I have never seen before. They fit as they should, and this is one of the few toys my insane 3 year old boy will sit down and spend any time with, so it's awesome that he can do it by himself so Mommy can slip away & be productive for a few minutes! If I had any complaint, it would be that there are so many parts & accessories that it's hard to fit it all back in the suitcase when playtime is over.
customer_reviews.author: Joy A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Old school fun
customer_reviews.text: My son adores Mr and Mrs Potato head and I bought this to get extra accessories. They’re unique and FUN. One draw back is these particular parts are pretty stiff to get in the holes... eventually they will loosen up and fit perfect but might be a draw back to some people. Not me. I love this and so does my 2 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Sara J Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great package for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew who is visiting for the summer. He is 4 years old and has been asking for Mr. Potato head since he stepped off the plane. We went to the store but it was only the potato head with no accessories for practically the same price. It comes with it's own carry case and he certainly carries it everywhere. He tried taking it to the playground.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D.

customer_reviews.title: Great set, improvements could be made in the suitcase closure.
customer_reviews.text: There's a couple of things about this set. It is a great set, especially for the price. You get so many accessories. I chose this one in particular because it came with a suitcase to put all of the little bits away when playtime was done. My only complaint about it is that I wished the "suitcase" shut a bit more securely. The way it is now, if you jostle it a bit, its going to open up and everything is going to spill out. Other than that, definately worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LaBreezy

customer_reviews.title: Great, but minor issues
customer_reviews.text: You get what you see (potato body included), plus a case. Generally great build quality - no weird jags or seams, no unexpected weak points. Lost star because a number of the pieces have insertion pegs that are too big for easy insertion into the body - I have to force it as an adult, and my toddler can’t do it at all
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: A must to go with the basic Mr. Potato Head
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Mr.Potato Head for my two-year-old grandson. My fault that I did not read the package contents because it only had the basic parts (one hat, one set of ears, etc.) He really seemed to enjoy it as soon as he opened the present so I decided to buy this so he would have more choices to play with. This looks like a great addition to the basic Mr. Potato Head.
customer_reviews.author: K LTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Potato Head!
customer_reviews.text: It's Mr. Potato Head, what's not to love?! I bought this as a Christmas gift for my great-great nephew who turned 2 yrs old just 2 wks after Christmas, and he loves it! Of course sometimes he looks sort of like a Picasso, but so did the one in Toy Story, so ........ :-) This is a good size for little hands, not too big & not too small. And I love the pieces that come with this one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Good but the container is small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great version of the classic Mr. Potato Head I had as a kid. There are lots of options, but some of the bigger accessories don't fit in the butt of the Mr. Potato Head, which frustrates my toddler. The entire container is a bit small too. The pieces will not all fit unless you put the bigger pieces (feet and body) in first then surround them with the smaller pieces. The pieces are also stiff so it is hard for younger kids to push and pull them in and out but I think that will lessen over time. I still think this is a five star product since my "complaints" are very minor.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Eastridge

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my son's 2nd birthday. There are so many options to create silly faces! The only issue is that the glasses bend easily and do not sit on the face very well. We still get a lot of use out of this, I don't think in over 2 months we've created the same look twice!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hoysradt

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the cutest! My son loves putting it together and taking it apart. He also loves putting all the pieces in the luggage then dumping it out. To date, it’s the toy he goes to the most. I will be buying this as a birthday gift. Note that my son is 20 months, younger than stated as safe, but he is the perfect age for this and will be for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: laugh

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Toddler approved Mr Potato Head! My son is obsessed with this toy and we all have a good time playing with it. It truly reminds me of my own childhood, so I was happy when he asked for it. The accessories are great and we haven’t had any issues with pieces fitting or breaking off. Great quality for sure. Can’t wait to buy the Mrs. Potato Head next!
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic For Playtime
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my nearly two year old. He loves to bring the kit over and build the potato head! Getting the pieces into the potato is still too tough for him (they go in REALLY snug) but it's a great opportunity for us to play with him and for him to use his creativity and imagination as he chooses where each piece goes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Items are awesome, but incorrect
customer_reviews.text: We love potato head stuff! It's amazing! The only problem with ours is that we ordered Mr. Potato Head's Silly Suitcase and a Mrs. Potato Head. We received our Mrs. Potato Head and then instead of Mr. Potato Head's Silly Suitcase, we received Mrs. Potato Head's Silly Suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Love the carrying case and number of accessories
customer_reviews.text: This is so great!! I am a speech teacher and I got this for my students at school to play with and to describe. I haven’t opened it up yet to get all of the pieces, but I love the carrying case and it looks great! Especially for the price, this came with so many pieces. Can’t wait to get back to school for my kiddos to have a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old loves this! (And our 13 year) I was a little worried since the last potato head we bought, it was hard to push the pieces into. It is a little hard, but it is able to hold the funny designs he makes. I would definitely recommend! I even love the case it comes with to carry all the pieces in.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boarts

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Potato Head is timeless!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s Mr. Potato Head! Loved it as a child and my child loves it now! Nice big pieces for younger kids (mine is 2.5). Some pieces take a little bit of force at first, but are easier to put on with a couple of uses. Overall, I’d say it’s a good buy for any tiny person in your life. Teaches fine motor skills, parts of the body/face, and fosters creativity (Arm for an eye? Sure! Why not? It’s a potato!). All packed in a handy carry case.
customer_reviews.author: AmyK

customer_reviews.title: Gift for My Great Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought Mr. Potato Head for my Great Grandson. I am so glad I did. He loves it. He even watches the commercials for the potato chips. I actually bought it for Christmas, but his mom said he had just seen Toy Story movies and he enjoyed them. So I said, "Why not give it to him now.".
customer_reviews.author: Martha P.

customer_reviews.title: like instead of 4 moustaches
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it! I wish it had more accessories with it, like instead of 4 moustaches, 4 sets of eyes would have been better. But it's cute and he enjoys playing with it, so I'd say it's a win.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute as always
customer_reviews.text: A classic with so many fun options. I only wish the suitcase was slightly bigger to accommodate a built potato head. He has to be disassembled and most kids aren’t that detailed in their cleaning up so mom ends up taking him apart to make it all fit back in the bin. Not a huge deal, just a thought for the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Great for coordination and creativity! All kids should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Me potato head is always a good toy to help with a lot of skills such as coordination, imagination, creativity. All of my kids have had one and my youngest which is 2 has not quite got the hang of how to play with it but thinks it’s hilarious when I make funny faces with it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Henriksen

customer_reviews.title: Great classic toy that's very entertaining for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great classic toy that's very entertaining for kids. My only issue with this toy is that some of the pieces (i.e. Eyes, arms, ears...) are such a tight fight that it becomes close to impossible for young kids to insert and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: For 4 year old birthday!
customer_reviews.text: My son is always playing with a mr potato head when i pick him up in the evenings from daycare. His face lit up when i gifted this for his birthday. He loves that it has so many different faces . It looks exactly how its pictured and sturdy. A good buy
customer_reviews.author: AddictedtoAmazon

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old loves this!!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old absolutely loves this thing!! He plays with it every day. It has definitely helped him to learn the identity of all of the various body parts that we have, haha. The parts are large enough that I’m not concerned about him trying to swallow one or getting one stuck in his ear 😆😆
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good toys. Pieces fit into our other potato head. The carry case is nice but because we have a larger collection we use our own bin but use this one for other toys. Good for all ages my kids are 2,6,&8 and all love the potato head bin!
customer_reviews.author: jennah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and durable toy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this with the intent to build it completely in freefall skydiving. We were able to successfully build 3/4 of it and it held up perfectly against 120mph. The pieces stayed in place no problem. I would highly recommend this product and will purchase this again should we accidentally lose all the pieces over time.
customer_reviews.author: William O.

customer_reviews.title: Oddly difficult for a child to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my pre-school age boys at Christmas because I remember loving this toy as a kid. They do enjoy it but cannot play with it independently because it is oddly hard to push the pieces in. I was hoping it would get easier with time & use but at 2 months in it has not. Maybe better for the 5+ crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Svatek

customer_reviews.title: Many Different Faces
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year-old grandson received this gift for his birthday and he's crazy about Mr. Potato Head. He spends endless hours arranging all the pieces to make different looks for Mr. Potato! The carrying case was nice for keeping all the little pieces together, as well.
customer_reviews.author: tlc

customer_reviews.title: Just the toy I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Some people commented about how the pieces fit too tightly. They are tight but I'm sure will loosen in time and the whole toy is super durable, well designed and so much fun for my 3 year old and 1.5 year old. You can always stick the pieces in a big chunk of playdoh
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids working on their speaking
customer_reviews.text: My son is working on his communication and this is great for some vocab exercises. Identifying each of the different items before putting them on and talking about what you can do with each part (i.e. eyes so he can see). Recommended purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the birthday
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the general Mr and Mrs. Potato head. He's lost a few accessories so I wanted to get him a refill kit. This was under $20 and had a new Potato Head and a ton of accessories. It was the hit gift of his birthday! Well made, great packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: If You Don’t Love Mr. Potato Head, We Can’t Be Friends!
customer_reviews.text: I mean, seriously, who doesn’t love Mr. (or Mrs.) Potato Head!? This is a classic! Came as described, we’ll packaged and quickly. Everything was perfect. My only complaint is that I had to take turns playing with it with my three year old grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Help-Me-Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Cute but container too small to reuse
customer_reviews.text: Plastic container barely fits the pieces when storing pieces. Cant just have your toddler put her toys away. An adult will need to adjust pieces to close lid. Frustrating. Would be nice if the toy had an adequate storage container. Otherwise, cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for my 3 y/o son. Mr. Potato Head stands the test of time. He had a basic Mr. PH set and would love watching youtube videos of people playing with theirs as he played with his. They had all these awesome accessories but he did not. I found this and ordered it for him and now he enjoys this kit for hours at a time with his mom, his sisters, or myself.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lynch

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This potato head has lots of different combinations and fits my sons silly personality! I also love that it comes in a convenient case so when he’s done playing with it we have a place to store it so the parts don’t get mixed up with other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: SLP approved !
customer_reviews.text: I love using Mr. Potato head for speech and language therapy. I treat children ages 0-5years old and Mr. P is a very age appropriate toy. I felt like this was one of the best prices I’ve seen for him!
customer_reviews.author: Chiona

customer_reviews.title: Good product, no issues 😄
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for Mr Potato Head! I read the reviews prior to purchasing, and most were good. I didn't have any of the issues that I read about... The pieces for, the case closes fine and it doesn't seem like the quality is any different than when I was a kid. My son loves it because of Toy Story, so it's now part of his private Toy Story collection 😄
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This potato man set helps my son to learn body parts. The quality of this set is the best. It might be a little tight for little ones to put on or take off but I think it can practice their arm muscles. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pieces, but the suitcase is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: So cute! An awesome amount of pieces! Hours of fun for my 4 year old boy. However, the suitcase is so flimsy. It won't close. So when he loads it up and tries to carry it away by the handle, all the pieces fall everywhere! Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Vani

customer_reviews.title: Kiddio loves it
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old absolutely loves it. All the parts seem to be made out of good strong material, not cheap so that’s always good. Also I do love all the extra selections that they have now vs whenever I was a kid!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Mr. Potato Head. It’s great for the value. It’s cute and he enjoys playing with it. The size of the potato is quite big compared to other ones. Overall I’m happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a potato head for his birthday, this is the perfect set! Such a variety of pieces for the potato head plus a carry case!? This is a great toy for such an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMama

customer_reviews.title: Classic toy that's still fun
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Potato Head is a classic toy that is still fun for kids. No batteries required, just imagination. My children get creative and dress him up in silly ways. I like the secret compartment in the part that holds parts but I wish it were a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This toy is as great as the original just better. You get so many more pieces to make different faces. My son loves once he’s put together. Seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylonda Pelto

customer_reviews.title: A whole lot of tater head!
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who sometimes stuggle to see the pictures for the merchandise, ignore it, or would just prefer the description to be better... This item comes with 35 pieces!!!! That's a whole lot of tater head! My 8 yr old was super excited to get this, and I was really impressed with the quality. The suitcase makes it really much easier for her to keep track of the pieces, also. I'm really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hauger

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Potato Head
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES Mr. Potato head and this kit is perfect for him! He now has a whole potato head family! He sets them all on his “stage” like they’re all in a band! It’s hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Jesslyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute With Options
customer_reviews.text: The arms don't go in all of the way and fall out. This could have been made a little more carefully. It's cute though. I plan to play with it with my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Kinseysmom

customer_reviews.title: Self-contained fun mess
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and self-contained. Great for Mom and Dad to avoid big messes long-term. The pieces however fit pretty tightly on the different potatoes so I would say foreign up can probably handle putting the pieces in without any help but a child below that age might need some assistance playing with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Camden

customer_reviews.title: nice gift for toddlers!!
customer_reviews.text: got it for my 2 years old, he's so exited and really love it , but it is little hard to push the different parts into it... they could have made it easier... otherwise it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Yasooooo

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and totally would give it as a gifts . My 2 year old loves his uncle, and plays with him on a daily basis. Very educational for them, works on the motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella Karim

customer_reviews.title: Fun for 3 yr old grandston
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves interchanging the pieces. This is a multi-generational toy that HIS parents played with. Happy to see it still around. Great for creativity!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves this
customer_reviews.text: My two year old plays with potato head at least once a day this is so fun and it came with a nice plastic container that I still use to store all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mr. Potato Head
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and originally purchased this Mr. Potato Head for my classroom, but my two year old son ended up loving it so much, that it never made it's way to school. It's a great Potato Head with lots of fun pieces and accessories. It's also nice that it comes with a plastic carrying case, so that all of the pieces can stay together and organized.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Super Potato Head
customer_reviews.text: This Mr. Potatoe head was an upgrade from the old school cersipn. There are so many pieces to really engage the imagination. My grandson loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: AvidShopper

customer_reviews.title: Many pieces to choose from and great storage tub!
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are varied so kids can make choices and use their words to describe (yellow hands/blue hands). I especially love the tub that the pieces are stored in...it’s shaped like a potato!
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of accessories to use!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves toy story which is why I bought this. So cool that it comes with so many accessories! It’ll take him a while before he gets bored of this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my soon to be 2yr Granddaughter. She absolutely loves to put things together an Mr Potato Head is one of them. Made well and great value
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Mr potatohead is a classic
customer_reviews.text: Mr.Potatohead has come a long way. They aren't made like they used to be and the variety seems a bit limited than what I remembered. However it keeps the little ones happy
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great product....bad box.
customer_reviews.text: Mr Potato Head is always fun! My 3 year old grandson loves this product. The only problem is the box keeps popping open and won't latch.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect classic mr. Potato head with cute add-ons
customer_reviews.text: It's a mr. Potato head. This will never go out of style! It comes in a plastic container with a lid which is perfect for containing all those little pieces so they're not stepped on! Ouch! Plenty of different looks to entertain the child. And personally we've used this to help my son learn body parts and names for clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Scarpaci

customer_reviews.title: Not what I remembered from my childhood
customer_reviews.text: Three stars... It's OK. The mustaches don't seem to fit right on the noses, and don't work with most of the mouths included. Some of the arms don't seem quite right. The glasses don't stay on at all. We're going to keep it, but I am disappointed because I don't remember having these issues with the one I had when I was a kid
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: can't get enough of these collections !!!  They all fit each other fine, and so much fun.
customer_reviews.text: so happy with all the choices for the faces on these sets...fits other sets, we really are so happy with all the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Devonne Amos

customer_reviews.title: Good toy. Some of the pieces are a little tough to get in.
customer_reviews.text: A classic toy. I like that there are more pieces to switch out than when I was little. Some of the pieces/holes aren't quite sized right so my son has a hard time getting them in and even I have a little trouble with some myself.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Love potato head, but he is sold seperatley
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with Mr. Potato head, my niece absolutely loved playing with this...I did have to purchase potato head as well but the price is still very reasonable for the amount of enjoyment kids of a wide range of ages seem to have playing with this ...I just love Mr. Potato Head
customer_reviews.author: D Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome toy! I grew up with Mr. potato head so I decided to buy one for my son. The pieces are thick plastic, and the carry case keeps the pieces from getting lost! Cute gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tabithanoelle

customer_reviews.title: Very good toy set
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this! I remember playing with this when I was a kid and it surely does stand the test of time. My son is a little over two years old and really enjoys playing with this. The pieces are made well the only thing we don't like is that the glasses don't stay on his face well. Other than that it's pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Echo C

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old grandson. Pieces are large so no issues with choking hazards. Mr Potato Head is large and has a compartment in back (just like on toy story). Not all pieces will fit, but the smaller ones ie ears, nose, lips etc fit. My little guy loves it. It reminds me of when I was a kid and I had one. I recommend. .
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Merle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a little one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my great nephew. He loves it and I like that it helps him learn coordination and encourages creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: The whole family is enjoying this set! Would be nice if it had a bit more space in the box. It does close nicely for the pieces from the set but doesn't accommodate extra potato heads etc. Also would love an option to buy additional accessories.
customer_reviews.author: AirSunT

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad to see he has survived the gender neutral movement
customer_reviews.text: A fine classic toy. The suitcase for the various components is a huge plus. Plenty of pieces. I deducted a star for quality control, as some of the pieces are an extremely tight fit into the head. Considering what this play set is actually comprised of . . . it's priced a bit high in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: T.M. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely a hit with my 3 yr old son. He loves this! Made well packaged well delivered quickly!
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not much interest for four year old.
customer_reviews.text: Fun for four year old. Played with it about an hour and is not a go to toy. Perhaps for a younger age?
customer_reviews.author: schnauzergirl

customer_reviews.title: Must have for an SLP!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Speech-Language Pathologist, and this is a must have if you work with preschoolers/kinder/first! This set is perfect! It has so many choices for students to make! There are lots of combinations and it looks adorable when they are finished! You can't find this kind of set anywhere but Amazon! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 and 3 year olds too!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 3 year old granddaughters love to play with this! I thought that they may be too young for Mr. Potato Head but it was easy to use and had big, heavy duty parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Although it was a brand new, sealed package, it arrived missing one of the short, white arms.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! He is working with an ABA therapist that suggested we buy this and it is teaching him the different body parts.
customer_reviews.author: Annealisea

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandboys and they really enjoy playing with it. There are plenty of parts to keep them busy for 30 min at least and there is a container to keep it all together.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Classic Mr Potato with more pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy! My son loves this, so many more pieces to play with than when I was his age!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. Very nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit. Only wish it had extra feet lol. Silly but my son loves shoes so much!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hulett

customer_reviews.title: Cool but pieces don’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: My son loves all of the pieces that come with it however, it’s so hard for the pieces to go into the holes that he often times can’t do it! You have to twist and turn and push the pieces in very hard. I have a hard time getting them in and out myself!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it has more accessories. Other than that my 3 year old lives his Mr. Potato Head.

customer_reviews.title: Funny faces
customer_reviews.text: My 21 months old love it, keep him entertain for hours . Perfect to learn the face parts . We love it too . Great 🎁 .

customer_reviews.title: love Mr. Potato head and all its parts
customer_reviews.text: love Mr. Potato head and all its parts. I hate the case it came with. It does not stayed closed. So when your kids are carrying it around the house the pieces always fall out!

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Who doesn't love a potatoe head
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a lighting deal. All the pieces are thick and sturdy for little hands. Some of the peices are harder to push is so my almost 3 year old gets frustrated but he still likes to play with it.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loves it!

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves it! Great toy just like what I had when I was a kid except this one had many more pieces and accessories. The carrying case is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Potato
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old grandson. It brought back memories of when his mama was little and played with Mr. Potato Head. He has continued to play with this toy, unlike other toys who have lost their luster within a short time. I like that it has a case to hold all the parts. It's a classic!.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Paterak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I teach online and this is perfect for teaching parts of the face. My students love it since they get to choose what parts to put on and in the end, they always laugh. It's also perfect for my son when he gets a little older. He is 19 months right now and it is difficult for him to pull parts out still.
customer_reviews.author: cfperry

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 1 I had as a kid
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts and pieces my son loves all the funny combinations he can make

customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves Mr.Potatoe head. He has so much fun with it. I love it came with it's own storage case.

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as cool as Mrs Potato Head.
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Potato Head doesn't have all the cool choices for building faces as Mrs. Potato Head it's boring in comparison.

customer_reviews.text: We already had a Mr. Potato head but needed more pieces. This is the best value we were able to find and the kids enjoy their new Potato Head accessories!

product_meta.title: Playskool Mr. Potato Head Silly Suitcase Parts and Pieces Toddler Toy for Kids (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: The Mr. Potato Head toy is a fun and entertaining toy for girls and boys ages 2 and up. The Mr. Potato Head Silly Suitcase kids' toy includes a classic 8-inch potato body and lots of accessories for little ones to make silly and wacky characters! More pieces for even more mix-and-mash fun! Mr. Potato Head comes in a carry-along suitcase full of parts and pieces, like crazy glasses and wacky mustaches. Preschoolers can add some silly style to their favorite spud and go on imaginative adventures. Plus, the convenient tater case makes cleanup easy and lets little ones take the adventure with them almost anywhere they go. Most parts are compatible with other Mr. Potato Head and Mrs. Potato Head toys. (Each sold separately.) Mr. Potato Head and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: TOY FOR PRESCHOOLERS AND TODDLERS: Kids will love playing with the variety of different parts and pieces included in this Playskool Mr. Potato Head Silly Suitcase toy
INCLUDES 35 PIECES: Bring on the laughs as kids put pieces in the Mr. Potato Head body every which way. When it comes to Mr. Potato Head toys, there is no wrong way to play when mixing and mashing
CONVENIENT STORAGE CASE: The Mr. Potato Head Silly Suitcase comes in a convenient carry-along suitcase for fun on the go and easy cleanup and storage
ENTERTAINING TOY FOR TODDLERS: Kids can create all kinds of characters, faces, and expressions with the crazy glasses, wacky mustaches, and other Mr. Potato Head accessories
LOVED FOR GENERATIONS: Do you remember playing with the Mr. Potato Head toy as a child? Introduce new generations to this classic toy for kids

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
